about_the_game:
ESCAPE THE CURSED DUNGEON

In The Dark Crown: Genesis, you are thrown into a dungeon ruled by ancient demonic forces. Equipped with the forbidden Element of Darkness, you must fight through relentless enemies and overcome powerful demon bosses to claim their dark powers, weapons, and forge your path to freedom.

CONQUER THE DARK ELEMENTS

Each demon boss embodies a dark element—void, shadow, chaos, oblivion, and pure darkness. By defeating them, you can steal their elemental powers and unique weapons to reshape your combat style. Along the way, confront elemental generals, whose distinct weapons become yours to wield.

HANDCRAFTED AND PROCEDURAL DUNGEONS

Experience a dungeon that combines meticulously designed areas with procedurally generated maps. Each run is unpredictable, offering unique enemy encounters and environmental challenges that keep every attempt fresh and engaging.

LEARN THROUGH DEATH

Each defeat is a lesson. With rogue-lite progression systems, you gain permanent upgrades and unlock new strategies to take on the dungeon’s evolving threats.

PLAYTEST AVAILABLE

The Dark Crown: Genesis is preparing for its early-access with an available playtest. Help shape the game’s future by exploring its mechanics, fighting its bosses, and sharing your feedback.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: None

short_description: A pixel-perfect rogue-lite where darkness becomes your greatest weapon. Sacrificed by your kingdom, you awaken in the depths of the endless cursed dungeon. Defeat powerful Demons, claim their elements, and rise through.
